name: Royal Purple 0W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 1 qt
categoryPath: Auto & Tires/Motor Oil, Transmission Fluid & Car Lubricant/Motor Oil

reviews.name: Royal Purple 0W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 1 qt
reviews.reviewText: my first time using this product, I noticed a huge difference in the sound of the engine and the power
reviews.title: better gas mileage along with power

reviews.name: Royal Purple 0W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 1 qt
reviews.reviewText: I drive a 2000 Audi A8. I have used Mobile 1 and Lubro Moly, after switching to Royal Purple I no longer have dry start knock after days of just sitting that was present while using the others. I love this oil. Thanks to Cody Bartkowiak from tech support for the quick answers to my questions.
reviews.title: Great Product

reviews.name: Royal Purple 0W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 1 qt
reviews.reviewText: Just drove my 2010 Mustang GT Convertible for apron 10 miles after change to Royal Purple and noticed an increase in power, better sound, and improved performance. I am wondering if I (or future owner) can go back to regular oil at some point?
reviews.title: First Impression

reviews.name: Royal Purple 0W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 1 qt
reviews.reviewText: Do research for articles on RP's synerlec. I trust it to protect all my toys regardless of size.
reviews.title: Always find an excuse to use more RP products

reviews.name: Royal Purple 0W-20 Synthetic Motor Oil, 1 qt
reviews.reviewText: I own a 2004 Subaru impreza I got it at 142k it has now 152k so I decided to upgrade my oil to synthetic I chose Royal Purple because I know two other guys who use the same oil in there wrx! I read descriptions about the products in mags too! I Quickly noticed my car ran 100% smoother, I also noticed that my Car did perform Power wise better too! Thanks For Awesome Products ! Unfortunately I didn't find my Oil filter in your name at the store I went to but I did get a K&N.
reviews.title: Big Difference
